name: Obelisk Foretold
description:
Obelisk Foretold:

In Obelisk Foretold you are the commander of a small just established colony. You must endure the harsh environment and setup a thriving colony while also deciphering the Obelisk in the center of the Colony.

You must manage several different economy elements as well as get a combat force to protect your colony from Xeno lifeforms and pirates. Just remember to not forget the needs of your own people!

Controls:

W A S D to move and control the Camera.

Holding down the middle mouse button will allow you to rotate the camera.

Mouse Wheel Scroll to Zoom In and Zoom Out.

Left Mouse button to Select Structures and units.

Right Mouse button to give orders to unit.

A Selection box can be drawn to select multiple squads, holding down shift will append units to your control selection.

Graphics Options can be slightly adjusted via the In-game menu, as well as BGM can be toggled (default off)

Our game is a Colony Management Strategy game where you must build up a colony while managing your Income.

You must also manage the Obelisk and the Deciphering of its Prophecies which have gameplay implications.

Win condition is completing the Final Translation on the Obelisk after day 17.

THEME: Our take on As Above, So Below was that of life (or a colony in this instance) being controlled by pretermined outcomes and fate.

Game is made using Unreal Engine. If you require the pre-reqs it is under:
ExtractLocation\Engine\Extras\Redist\en-us\UE5PrereqSetup_x64.exe
